sen.j: 1952年、北野天満宮で50年に一度行われる大萬燈祭の記念に初演された。
sen.e: It was first performed in 1952 in commemoration of the Dai-Mandoe Festival which is held once every fifty years at the Kitano Tenmangu Shrine.

sen.j: 以来上七軒の特色を生かし、少数ながらにし舞台を披露している。
sen.e: Since then the flavor of the Kamishichiken Geisha district has been brought to life and presented on stage in a modest way.

sen.e: In the famous finale, the song 'Kamishichiken Serenade' is played and Geisha and Maiko dance to the accompaniment.
